description:
Love card games? Astraware Solitaire is a fantastic collection featuring 12 of the most well-known single player card games, chosen based on direct feedback and suggestions from customers. It includes Klondike, Pyramid, Spider, Clock, Yukon, Canfield, Four Seasons, Sultan's Harem, Idiot's Delight, Golf, Calculation, and Freecell, each with custom gameplay options so you can play using your favorite variation on the standard rules.

Other features include: Choice of decorative backgrounds, wide choice of card backs and selection of card fronts including clear card face, extra card backs and backgrounds unlocked with special achievements as you play, detailed game statistics including how long you've played and how often you win, Golden Trophy Deck award system - win the golden cards during play and once the whole deck is unlocked, use it to play with, enable speed deal by turning off animations, change the gameplay options by tapping the Game Rules card.
